metadata.title: Ship Name Generator - Create Perfect Names for Your Vessel
metadata.description: Generate unique and meaningful names for your vessel using our smart ship name generator. Supporting various styles including romantic, adventure, luxury, and more.

home.title: Ship Name Generator
home.subtitle: Create the Perfect Name for Your Vessel
home.step1Description: Input two names in the fields below to personalize your ship name.
home.step2Description: Select from our themed styles to match your preferences.
home.step3Description: Click the button and our AI will create the perfect name for your vessel.
home.resultDescription: Click a name to select it. Not quite right? Keep generating until you find the perfect one!
home.error: An error occurred while generating names. Please try again.
home.exampleDescription: Here are some examples of generated names:

styleDescriptions.romantic: Perfect for couples celebrating their love
styleDescriptions.humorous: Fun and witty names with a touch of humor
styleDescriptions.mythology: Names inspired by gods and legendary figures
styleDescriptions.nature: Inspired by the beauty of the natural world

exampleNames.name: Joralis
exampleNames.meaning: A harmonious blend of John and Sarah, evoking the serenity of ocean waves and coastal living

exampleNames.name: Sarohnia
exampleNames.meaning: Merging Sarah and John into a melodic houseboat name that embodies tidal rhythms and aquatic tranquility

exampleNames.name: Jonarith
exampleNames.meaning: Combining John and Sarah with 'maritime' to create a name that suggests gentle currents and floating harmony

exampleNames.name: Salijon
exampleNames.meaning: Fusing Sarah and John into a flowing name that mirrors the peaceful drift of a houseboat on calm waters

exampleNames.name: Harborohn
exampleNames.meaning: Blending 'harbor' with John and Sarah, symbolizing safe anchorage and coastal serenity
